      • getController

        public static RESTProcessController getController(int port)

      • start

        public boolean start()
              throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: IProcessController
        Start controlling and calling any registered listeners. Must be called before listeners will be called. Calling this after already started must have no effect.
        Specified by:
        start in interface IProcessController
        Returns:
        true if started successfully or already started.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: IProcessController
        Stop controlling and calling any registered listeners. Generally this cleans up any threads or other resources created during IProcessController.start(). Calling this after already stopped must have no effect.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface IProcessController
